entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
